attributes.action: Intervene to prevent the intended disposal of Elvaston Castle Country Park by Derbyshire County Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We support the Friends of Elvaston Castle in their alternative rescue plan for Elvaston Castle Country Park, Derby, which we believe to be beneficial to the community and join them in calling for a fully wide ranging and meaningful public consultation on the matter.

We object to any sale or lease which places the Country Park in the hands of private commercial developers for any reason whatsoever.
